resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="whitespace",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "pattern_replace",
            "pattern": "(dog)",
            "replacement": "watch$1"
        }
    ],
    text="foxes jump lazy dogs",
)
print(resp)
